snippet: Concern over preparations for the Confederations Cup this summer increased after FIFA canceled an inspection visit at the Maracanã stadium in Brazil because the stadium was flooded.
lead_paragraph: Concern over preparations for the Confederations Cup this summer increased after FIFA canceled an inspection visit at the Maracanã stadium in Brazil because the stadium was flooded.

headline.seo: FIFA Cancels Stadium Inspection Visit After Flood
headline.main: FIFA Cancels Stadium Inspection Visit After Flood
